amendment.description: To amend the Oklahoma City National Memorial Act of 1997 to authorize the transfer of funds for the endowment fund for the Oklahoma City National Memorial, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2204 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2204 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4191) To amend the Oklahoma City National Memorial Act of 1997 to authorize the transfer of funds for the endowment fund for the Oklahoma City National Memorial, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2204 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2204 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
